Review Title: As simple and straightforward as it gets
Review Text:
I’ve used Splid now for over a year on different trips away. Some abroad, some at home and a mixture of just two people or up to five. 
It’s been a lifesaver; no more faffing around trying to figure out who owes what, who’s down after getting a meal or paying for that boat trip. 
What it does it does very well and I’d recommend anyone needing to keep a tally on expenses to give it a try. 
Simple interface, you can add a nice trip picture for the event or holiday and as long as someone remembers to add an expense, it gets added into the mix of outgoings. 
What becomes obvious is that when you’re all using Splid to keep track of your holiday expenses, it really doesn’t matter who gets the next round drinks, or the meal or the excursion, as it all gets worked out in the end. 
I love it, and will continue to use this for the long term. Kudos to the creator Nico. 
Thank you!

Splid is a game-changer for anyone who frequently finds themselves splitting bills with friends, family, or colleagues. Whether you’re on a group trip, dining out, or sharing expenses with roommates, this app makes the process effortless and fair.

**User-Friendly Interface**  
The first thing you’ll notice about Splid is its clean and intuitive interface. It’s incredibly easy to set up a group, add expenses, and assign them to the relevant people. Even if you’re not tech-savvy, you’ll find navigating through the app a breeze.

**Flexible Expense Tracking**  
Splid allows you to split bills in multiple ways—equally, by percentage, or custom amounts—catering to different group dynamics. You can add notes to each expense, which is great for remembering specific details. The app supports multiple currencies, making it ideal for international trips.

**Offline Functionality**  
One of Splid's standout features is its ability to work offline. You don’t need a constant internet connection to manage your expenses, which is perfect when you’re traveling or in areas with poor connectivity. Once you’re back online, the app syncs everything automatically.

**Seamless Settlement Process**  
When it’s time to settle up, Splid provides a clear breakdown of who owes whom, simplifying the payment process. You can also export the summary as a PDF or Excel file, making it easy to keep records or share with your group.

**No Sign-Up Required**  
Another major plus is that Splid doesn’t require users to sign up for an account, which is a refreshing change from most apps. You can start using it right away without worrying about privacy concerns.

**Conclusion**  
Splid is hands down the best bill-splitting app available on the App Store. Its combination of user-friendly design, flexibility, and offline functionality makes it a must-have tool for anyone who regularly shares expenses. If you’re tired of the hassle and awkwardness of splitting bills, Splid is the solution you’ve been looking for. Highly recommended!

Gebe ich den Betrag unter “Jemand, der sich beteiligt“ ein, ohne eine Einladung an diese Person zu verschicken, verrechnet das Tool diesen Betrag mit allen anderen Beteiligten, was ja in diesem Fall nicht passieren soll.

Ob man dem Werkzeug, bzw. den Ergebnissen, trauen kann?
Davon war ich bisher ausgegangen und habe die Ergebnisse der Abrechnung einfach so auf die Teilnehmer umgelegt.

Jetzt wollte ich statt einer PDF ein Excel der Ergebnisse exportieren - was den Kauf voraussetzt - und dabei festgestellt, dass die Ergebnisse der Abrechnung im PDF erheblich abweichen von den Ergebnissen, die in Excel dargestellt werden.

Welche der beiden Abrechnungen richtig ist, kann ich derzeit nicht sagen - vielleicht sind auch beide falsch.

Ich habe den Entwickler mehrmals per eMail kontaktiert - leider ohne eine Rückmeldung, was ich nicht OK finde.

Also VORSICHTIG mit den Ergebnissen des Werkzeugs.

Am Ende einfach aufteilen und jede:r weiß, wieviel er:sie noch an wen zu zahlen oder von wem zu bekommen hat. Auch der Export in Excel oder pdf ist super hilfreich. Eine super einfache aber geniale App. Bis her habe ich noch keinen Bug gefunden. Egal wie groß die Gruppe ist, es hat nie Probleme gegeben.

Ich nutze die App jetzt schon seit etwa zwei Jahren und bin sehr zufrieden : )

Das einzige Manko, da wir in  zwei verschiedenen Währungen bezahlt haben mussten wir uns für eine Währung entscheiden. Das ist aber glaube ich nur ein Problem in der kostenlosen Variante.

Review Title: Da hat sich jemand was dabei gedacht 👍
Review Text: Klasse.

Die App ist einfach perfekt – besonders im Vergleich zu anderen ähnlichen Apps. Ein großer Vorteil ist, dass die Einträge nicht limitiert sind.

Einige zusätzliche Features würden die App jedoch noch weiter verbessern. Wünschenswert wären zum Beispiel eine Integration mit PayPal, die Möglichkeit, Gruppen zu archivieren, sowie eine übergreifende Account-Funktion. Letztere würde es ermöglichen, dass Nutzer, die in mehreren Gruppen aktiv sind, gemeinsame Zahlungen unkompliziert eintragen können – mit automatischer Synchronisierung über alle relevanten Gruppen hinweg.
Sehr gut, leichte Anwendung

Review Title: Easy to use! Perfect scope of features
Review Text: Easy to use! Perfect scope of features
Super einfach vor allen wenn man in einer Gruppe fährt, ist es leicht und übersichtlich den Betrag des Einzelnen zu errechnen und einzusehen.
Übersichtlich und mit vielen hilfreichen Funktionen - tolle App, die für die meisten Gruppen und Anlässe die perfekte Wahl sein dürfte. Vielen Dank an den Entwickler!
sehr sehr hilfreiche Berechnung auch für Kostenteilung bei Lebensmitteln außerhalb von Urlauben
Kann ich nur empfehlen!

Sehr hilfreich um die Ausgaben in einer wg oder sonstigen Wohn-Konstellationen im Blick zu behalten - wir (Paar mit Kind) wohnen zum Beispiel mit meiner Mutter zusammen und kaufen in der Regel jeweils für alle zusammen ein. Dabei können wir zb auch angeben, dass eine Ausgabe von meinem Mann UND mir (also vom gemeinsamen Konto) bezahlt wurde, damit uns keine falschen Schulden angerechnet werden. 
Ansonsten ist die App eher „Basic“, aber übersichtlich und genau das was wir brauchen.
Top App

Die App ist super. Eine Kalkulation schön einfach. Als Idee kam auf, ob man Belege nicht noch digital beifügen könnte, als Foto zB. Dann gibts bei den Zweiflern im Freundeskreis auch keine Fragen mehr.
Multiple Groups should not cost!
Lässt sich perfekt Händeln… ist selbsterklärend und am Ende gibt es eine gute Übersicht, wer wieviel an wen bezahlen muss. Weiter so! 😎✌️
Die App ist einfach zu bedienen und man hat viele Möglichkeiten.

Mein Freund und ich wohnen zusammen aber wir haben kein gemeinsames Konto, und wir nutzen die App für unsere gemeinsamen Ausgaben. Vorher haben wir das mit einem Excel-Sheet gemacht, und mit der App ist es soooo viel einfacher! Dafür die vier Sterne! ⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️
Wir vermissen aber folgende Features, die wären dann der fünfte ⭐️:
- Gutschriften, die haben wir z.B. öfter bei Bahnfahrten, wenn der Zug zu spät oder gar nicht kommt, und wir hinterher was erstattet bekommen (die Bahn…🙄), oder bei Nebenkostenabrechnungen. Wir haben bisher aber keinen guten Weg gefunden, sowas in der App abzubilden
- Kopieren von Ausgaben: wir legen pro Monat eine neue Gruppe an, und würden uns sehr über eine Möglichkeit freuen, Fixkosten einfach kopieren zu können 🙂
Aber auch ohne diese Features ist die App eine große Erleichterung, und sie verhindert Streit ums Geld! 😉 Vielen Dank dafür! 🤗

Solid ist eine wirklich gute App, wenn man mit mehreren Personen zusammen Urlaub macht. Einfach eine Gruppe bilden und dann nur noch die Ausgaben eingeben. 
Man kann immer genau sehen, wer was wofür und wann bezahlt hat. 
Am Schluss die Abrechnung, fertig. 
Sehr empfehlenswert.

Tolles Programm, ehrlich. Was hätte es mir Bordkassen, Städtetouren etc erleichtert. Wer hat das Sammelportemonnai? Wer die Belege? Wieviel Geld wieder reinschiessen? Und jetzt auch noch Sammelportemonnai in verschiedenen Währungen? Was war das für ein Geeier. 
Wie gesagt, tolle App- bislang keine Bugs entdeckt.

Review Title: Perfectly puts money in its place
Review Text: There’s nothing worse than when money gets in between friends. Just like doing the dishes, we all think we’re doing more than the other guy… Splid keeps track so there are no questions who spent what and when.
Super App, bildet alles ab was man braucht ohne Schnickschnack. 100% empfehlenswert. 👍🏽

Bisher haben wir im Urlaub immer stundenlang gerechnet, wer wem wieviel zu zahlen hat. Jetzt kann bei jedem Einkauf einfach eingegeben werden, wer an den Kosten beteiligt werden soll und alle haben immer den aktuellen Stand. Ich habe drei Euro investiert und kann damit verschiedene Gruppen managen. Sehr cool.

Wunderbar, dass es nach einem Urlaub keine Streitereien wegen Geld geben muss. Split ist super simple in der Bedienung und absolut flexibel, um auch sehr spezielle Rechnungen aufgeteilt zu bekommen. DANKE an dieser Stelle, für die neuen Möglichkeiten.

Kommt eine neue Einladung für eine Gruppe, dann befinden sich die Eingeladenen noch in ihrer alten Gruppe und landen nicht direkt in der neuen Gruppe. Da man für einen normalen Account lediglich eine Gruppe führen kann, ist es für Ungeübte etwas wirr erst aus der alten Gruppe aus- und in der neuen Gruppe einzutreten. Sonst absolut hilfreich. Dennoch frage ich mich bei einigen Aufteilungen, ob das wirklich so stimmt, da einige Rechnungen unlogisch wirken. Nichtsdestotrotz winke ich ab und es durch ;)

Review Title: Einfache App die tut was sie soll!
Review Text: Einfach, cool und effizient

There are a lot of competitors that cost money but this app has everything for free. The only time you have to pay is when you want multiple groups; but you can just delete your old group and create a new one instead. (But you should still support the creator through donations!!).

No subscriptions, everything works out of the box. You couldn't ask for more.

Das hier ist eine solide und übersichtliche App. Ich würde mir jedoch sehr wünschen, wenn die Eingabe des Betrags mit einem Taschenrechner verbunden wäre. Zum Beispiel wenn mehrere Produkte von einem Einkaufszettel abgezogen werden müssen, ist das hin und her springen zwischen Splid und dem Handy-Taschenrechner sehr mühsam. P.S.: Nico du bist ein Genie!

Praktisch, selbsterklärend, einfach anwendbar und unkompliziert. 

Es wäre hilfreich, wenn man die „Schulden“ verschieben könnte, um den Cashflow zu vereinfachen, so dass am Ende nicht alle kreuz und quer und an mehrere Personen überweisen müssen, sondern zb eine Person max. 2 weiteren Personen Geld schuldet, statt viele kleine Beträge in alle möglichen Richtungen.
Die App ist sehr leicht verständlich und überschaubar. Kein Schnickschnack, nur die wichtigsten Funktionen!

Die App erfüllt alle Anforderungen und Erwartungen. Benutzerführung ist intuitiv. Wir haben die App bei mehreren AlpenCross mit vielen Teilnehmern verwendet und hatten nie Probleme. Danke an den Entwickler für die investierte Zeit und Arbeit. Dranbleiben!
Splid war extrem nützlich bei der Abrechnung der Kosten auf einer Reise mit mehreren Teilnehmern.

Review Title: Beste App für Abrechnungen mit Freunden
Review Text: Mit Abstand die beste App für Abrechnungen mit Freunden! Die User Experience ist super intuitiv und es funktioniert perfekt! Ich habe lange Splitwise genutzt, aber bin mit Splid deutlich zufriedener.
Top

Eine ganz wunderbare App, die leicht und für jeden verständlich die Abrechnung von Ausgaben, mehrere Freunde erlaubt. Egal wie kompliziert die Abrechnung auch aussieht, löst sich alles mit einem Klick zur Zufriedenheit aller auf. Ein dickes Dankeschön an Nicolas Jersch!!!
Noch nie war es einfacher mit Gruppen abzurechnen!Danke für die App!

Die App ist super um Ausgaben im Blick zu halten. ich bin von Splitwise zu Splid gewechselt da ich von der ständigen Abo-Penetration genervt war. Außerdem war mir meine alte App irgendwie recht unübersichtlich.

Le tableau Excel de présentation est bien utile pour faire des évaluations de coût de chaque groupe ou projet. Review Title: Fait le job et meme plus

La seule amelioration que je vois qu il manque serait de visualiser les catégories dans la liste des dépenses ( a cote du nom de la personne qui a payé ou avec une icone) et aussi permetre le tri ou le groupage par categories dans cette liste des depenses sinon Squid est parfait 👍

Review Title: suggested payments kind of doesnt work
Review Text: This app seems really great at first, it has everything you would want, lets you see which payments affect different people and even shows how much has been payed in an excel sheet if you want. But after using it with my housemates for a couple weeks, I have come across a fatal flaw. Its suggested payments system is broken, it wont divide up how much each person owes to each person it will just show how much money they owe and 1 person who should not be receiving all that money. That feature was the whole reason we got the app and it doesnt work right.

Review Title: Lacks only one thing, but a major one
Review Text: It is a really amazing app but with one major limitation - the app makes it impossible to know which group member owes how much to the other. Sure, there are suggested payments but those further abstract the actual transaction amongst individual. I would request to allow for an option for normal/simple payments instead of the default suggested payments, which no doubt will increase the number of payments, but will make things easier to understand and digest for so many group members.

Review Title: Easy way to track and split costs
Review Text: This is a lightweight and easy to use app to track shared costs. It doesn’t require invasive permissions and allows you to invite people to groups to track and share costs. They can join using links, preserving their anonymity. I have used it in Europe, and appreciate that it can track costs in euros while presenting the summary in my home currency, and that it can seamlessly handle conversions from multiple currencies. I bought the premium version so that I can see expenses by categories and export to excel, and I also wanted to support the developer for having created something so elegant and simple which is also so useful.
I’ve tried others, this is the best. No more hassles on who owes what !
Super helpful and easy to use. Love the ability to switch currencies.

Is easy to use. Used it a lot to split expenses on my trips. Can highly recommend it for ease of mind. Even if you use it alone and the others tell you what they spent. Everyone can use the group with their download of the app. Awesome!
Great and easy to use app especially when travelling with friends or family or always on outings and needing to keep track of spendings!
Facile, intuitiva e molto utile quando si è in viaggio

Molto utile per suddividere le spese quando si fanno viaggi in gruppo. Permette di evitare noiosi calcoli, ad esempio dopo una cena: si può pagare a turno e inserire successivamente chi ha mangiato cosa e chi ha pagato. Alla fine si avrà un elenco dei componenti il gruppo, per ognuno dei quali sarà specificato quanto dare o quanto avere. Molto comoda.
App molto semplice da usare è molto efficace. Consente anche di estrarre reportistica di fine viaggio sia in Excel che in pdf. Meglio di così…
Nella sua semplicità risulta essere efficace davvero. La usiamo quando viaggiamo in gruppo.

Review Title: Mai più problemi nelle ferie condivise!
Review Text:
Ho visto l’app perché la usa spesso uno dei miei migliori amici e ci ha gestito più volte i viaggi in compagnia, così ho deciso di acquistarla.
Che dire? Top!

Ho provato diverse app che facessero la stessa cosa, ma questa credo sia la più semplice e immediata per la divisione delle spese. Il modulo pdf ed Excel è molto utile.

Richiedo allo sviluppatore se ce la funzione che mi divide la spesa totale in base all’arrivo delle nuove persone (es. Tizio paga il conto dell’albergo dell’intero periodo  per 4 notti per 3 camere doppie, ma solo la seconda notte si aggiunge il 6 componente. Come si può fare per dividere la spesa considerando che il 6° paga 3 notti invece che 4?)

App semplice da utilizzare ma completa e molto funzionale. Utilissima la possibilità di suddividere i costi anche parzialmente (cioè non con tutti i componenti del “viaggio”). Ho sbloccato le funzioni a pagamento perché merita.
Fantastica , ora non ne faccio più a meno nei miei viaggi !

Io e la mia coinquilina dividiamo in modo semplice le spese! Unica cosa che non capisco (possibile che non sappia neanche io bene come funzioni) nel momento in cui qualcuna paga qualcosa per un’altra e viene inserito l’importo pagato da una sola per una sola. Non dovrebbe venir fuori l’importo totale differenziato solo dal meno o dal più o potrebbe essere confusionario. 
Ad esempio io faccio la spesa e pago 40€ a testa: mi va bene che poi sia 20 e -20 ma se io pago direttamente una cosa a lei non dovrebbe essere 29 e -29 ma direttamente 20 e -29…credo ahahah 
Ma in realtà anche con questo è comunque molto carina e utile, consiglio ❤️❤️

Mi capita di viaggiare con le mie amiche e di condividere le spese. Per semplificare il momento del pagamento spesso una di noi si fa carico di tutti i costi per evitare di complicare la divisione finale. Al termine della vacanza alla tristezza del rientro si aggiunge lo stress del conteggio. Questa app intuitiva e di facile utilizzo consente di contribuire a turno alle spese perché in tempo reale tiene memoria di quanto speso da ciascuno. Quando si chiudono i conti in un nano secondo si sa chi deve dare dei soldi e a chi!

Soy usuario de plus de Splid y la uso bastante con mi pareja y amigos. Creo que una mejora práctica que agilizaría la introducción de gastos sería que se añadiera una persona por defecto en ajustes para no tener que añadirse siempre a uno mismo en la pantalla de nuevo gasto/de. En caso de querer modificarlo que se hiciera posteriormente.

Otra opción que ayudaría sería la edición de categorías a la hora de añadir gastos, para ver en que gastamos el dinero. A la hora de introducir el nombre del gasto que se sugiera una categoría pero, que se pudiera editar en cualquier caso añadiendo un color, una categoría distinta…

Gracias por esta magnífica app.

Llevo usando Splid desde hace años para llevar los gastos con mi pareja y para gestionar la economía cuando hacemos viajes en grupo. Su funcionamiento sencillo y su diseño eficaz hace de Splid mi app favorita para gestionar gastos.

La uso para dividir los gastos con mi roomie y ha servido de maravilla. Antes usábamos una hoja de cálculo que teníamos que estar revisando constantemente en la computadora, ahora sólo abrimos la app e ingresamos en el momento lo que compramos. Recomiendo la app al 100%

A friend and I took a trip to Europe and U.K. recently, and this app allowed us to put in all our expenses, who paid for what, what currency was used, and also to weight our expenses (for a short period of the trip, we had another friend join us, so not all expenses were split 50-50).  After I got home and downloaded the excel spreadsheet, I manually checked the figure given for the suggested payment to settle up, and the two figures were within a few dollars of each other - probably due to rounding errors.  I will continue to use this app based on its flexibility and accuracy.  I’d highly recommend this for travelers who want to split expenses, but who would rather settle up at one time, rather than having to always split the bill at the table or at the hotel.

We spent two weeks in Italy, sharing meals, taxi’s, hotels and drinks in numerous places. Splid made our payments so convenient and quick. No haggling over who will pick up the check, no paying for food with 5 different cards. You made our time together totally fun and hassle free. Each of us could enter expenses and assign costs, even when one or two people went elsewhere or when other guests joined us. Thank heavens one of the five had used it before and recommended Splid for all of us to use for our trip!  Thank you so much for putting so much thought into this reliable App!

Review Title: Loved this app - used it on a recent girls trip
Review Text: This app is easy to use and very helpful - used this app on a recent girls trip.   For example, when I tipped the tour guide - I was able to add that tip immediately to the this app then everyone on the group saw the charge and their portion immediately.   Yes, we could all manually track group expenses then figured out who owes what to whom but This app is easy to use, all expenses are visible to the entire group at anytime then easy to settle up.   I highly recommend to use this app for any group travel!!!  By using this app, it’s much easier to enjoy the trip and not worry about group expenses!!!

My girlfriend and I split expenses, but I usually pay for things at the time of purchase. I enter those purchases into Splid. She’ll forward funds to me periodically via Venmo, and enter it into this app. This has worked perfectly for our needs, and I really like that expenses can be split in ways other than 50/50. It’s quick and easy to use. We know where we stand at any point in time. I tried another app before this that did not meet our needs because the options weren’t as robust. I highly recommend this app.

Review Title: Most helpful group travel item ever!
Review Text: My siblings and I just took our octogenarian parents and their friend on a trip to Europe.  We’ve done this several times in the past and the accounting has seemed like a full time job for one or two of us.  This time we discovered Splid!  It saved us so much work and headache! Everyone felt confident that the expenses came out right.  That was important since we are all on a budget but wanted to do this for our parents.  It was easy to learn too.  So awesome! Thank you.

With a couple tweaks, it would be amazing. I do have the paid version but some features I’d like to see:

Saving tax rates - like I have a different grocery and a general sales tax. I’d like to be able to select taxes instead of having to calculate them myself outside of the app and then adding the expense. Sometimes I need to add multiple items and THEN do the tax rate per item (some being general, some being grocery.) But there is zero option for taxes. With that, maybe also a tip line for restaurants?

Also the ability to mass select and delete or categorize things would be excellent. Sometimes i forget to add categories when adding an expense and being able to do
So for multiple expenses at the same time would be excellent.

Otherwise - the app is the easiest and most user friendly budget app I’ve used. The paid version is worth having the categories.

Review Title: Remain friends when traveling or sharing expenses with groups!
Review Text: This app makes it sooo easy to split expenses when traveling or eating with multiple families or groups of friends. You name the event/expense, enter the amount paid, select who paid, and then identify who benefited from the expense (and what % or $ each person owes). As various expenses are entered, it tracks who owes whom how much and keeps a real-time overview/summary. This app helps us avoid confusion and tension (i.e., protects my friendships) as I travel with other families/friends and we pay for tours, excursions, meals, tips, etc.

Review Title: Amazing app which made my life so much easier
Review Text: My girl friends introduced me to that app a year ago and since then I have been using it all the time. It is so easy, efficient,  detailed and reliable. It let you split expenses in between your entire group or selected people in your hero up. You can switch currencies as well, very nice while traveling abroad. Thank you Splid for making my life so much easier. Sharing expenses is really easy thanks to you

Review Title: Very Useful and Easy to Use👍
Review Text: This was the perfect tool for a group of 9 to split up the cost of a group trip. Everyone was onboard and the expenses were made very transparent to all! I like how in the end the least amount of transactions is produced. At first I didn’t realize what exactly was happening with all the different “suggested payments” but then it became clear the software was eliminating redundant sending of money around. I highly recommend this app!

Have only used once so far, and specifically for a group trip, but brilliant on all aspects!  Four different people, but with multiple expense entries that were only for two or three people (as well as majority for all four).  Also, some expenses were split evenly between people (whether two, three, or four), but a number had specific allocations based on dollar amounts (eg, for meals) or percentages - all of which were very easy to do.  Highly recommended.

Had tried another app that just made things so complicated that years later we still haven’t reconciled some of our expenses.
This is pure joy on a trip!!  3 friends and lots of meals and cabs and fun theater etc all made super simple by this app- SO easy to enter and setup!  And we actually enjoyed watching our totals and being able to use it as a guide to who picked up the next tab.

It took a bit of trial and error, also digging through menus, so I could have made better use of it earlier with a little more guidance. But now that I've found all the different ways to split expenses, I will definitely use Splid again. Being the one who always eats less and drinks no wine, it's great to be able to put in my specific expenses regardless of who's paying. Look for the options of division by fraction, percentage, or amount.

We travel as a group often, and thought this app would help us as the three of us each booked different parts of our trip. 

Unfortunately, this app doesn’t seem to be able to handle more than two members properly. Some of the things were split three ways, and others just two ways. The app allowed us to spilt it evenly like that.

The biggest problem is that the amount owed to other group members are not accurate - at all. In our case, the app was hundreds of dollars off for one group member. It just shows total out put, minus total input, which doesn’t quite solve the problem...

I love Splid! It makes dividing expenses easy. This app let our party of 4 get combined checks all throughout a 2 week trip. Everyone was easily able to enter the expenses they incurred, in whatever currency it happened to be in. We were able to easily indicate who owed on the expense, whether it was all or some of the party. And it was easy to settle up when it was time, as well!

Visited some friends and this helped me track our expenses. I appreciated having this app and not having to add anyone else and just being able to manage everything within the app myself. 

Using the free version, I can’t speak to the paid version but there were a few things on there I would appreciate having the functionality for.

This is great app! We used it for a girls trip. Five ladies, each paying for something for the group.  Really liked the feature of selecting how many and who was needing to pay for a particular expense. We bought wine at a winery, but one of the ladies is not a wine drinker. It was super easy to have that expense split 4 ways. I also really like the summary report that shows what everyone paid for and owes.

I traveled in Europe with my sisters for 2 1/2 weeks. We decided that I would pay for whatever, enter it into this app, and settle up at the end. So easy to use and the sisters could quickly see where the money was going. Just set it up again for another trip with just one sister. She’s new to international travel and bad at math so she’s grateful for the app, too.

Used this app for the first time on a trip with 5 people. The app made it easy to keep track of spending. I like the fact that any member of the group can input spending and not leave it the responsibility of one person. Since we were traveling internationally the conversion to dollars helped. I will definitely use this for my next trip.

Review Title: Great for a group of travelers!
Review Text: Super easy to use and settle up even for complicated cost splitting. Our group was 8 travelers arriving and departing on different days with multiple rental houses and cars and mixed activities and meals. Receipts were easily logged and assigned to different participants on the fly.  Created a clear picture of both the total expense of the trip and the final settlement amounts to bring the costs to an even balance between everyone.

Review Title: I’ll never travel with friends without SPLID!
Review Text: I was always the one to tabulate and settle up manually, tracking, converting to pesos and back. The first trip I used SPLID made tracking swift and intuitive, even sometimes sharing expenses among only some of my fellows. Reconciling was finished in moments. And a lovely expense summary makes my inner bookkeeper very happy. I’ll also have an easy reference for budgeting the next trip based on real historic spending habits.

I used this app to track expenses across our group on a vacation and loved its ease of use, particularly that I could enter expenses for multiple people without having them all sign up and contribute. The summary and settle up features are great. My only suggestion is that you should add a summary of total payout in addition to total spend for each person. Thx for a great app!

Just used Splid to track a trip to Italy. One couple for six weeks, two couples for five weeks, and a third couple joining us for two of those weeks made for tricky accounting. We used both our traditional spreadsheets and Splid to track expenses including exchange rates etc. Splid was faster by a factor of probably 10, easier, and more accurate than our spreadsheet.

I was introduced to this app a little over a month ago. Just used it on a trip with a friend. It was so easy to quickly manage the $$ without creating a Google sheet or Excel. I’ll be sharing this with everyone I know on future outings, trips, and general needs. It’s a huge timesaver for me personally … I’m usually the one running the numbers— great app.

SPLID is simply super!  It made my last “girls trip” so very much easier than past years.  Surprising how “even” we stayed throughout the week!  I think just being aware and being able to see at a glance how much each had contributed !   We just rotated who paid, put it in SPLID and forgot it!  I would say it is the best app I downloaded in 2022!  Thank you!

Review Title: Awesome way to divide shared expenses.
Review Text: I never review apps. But we just came back from a weekend w friends where some people were at some activities, some drank more, etc.  after searching and trying at least 5 spreadsheets online, and 2-3 other apps, this one finally did the trick. Easy to use. Easy to customize split fees. Best of all - didn’t require me to submit everyone else’s emails to do the task.

I take a trip each year with friends, and different people pick up different portions of our expenses. This app was exactly what we needed on our last trip to make sure everyone was paid back, and I can’t say enough how helpful it is. We are using it again for our upcoming trip, too!

I have used this app to track group expenses on a number of vacations and I think is is great! Quick and easy to enter the expense so I don't even need to keep the receipt. Love how it tracks who made the payment and then the summary report at the end of the trip clearly shows the split between payments and expenses per person. No more arguing or second guessing. 

Keep up the good work!

I take a lot of trips with multiple friends and this makes expenses so much easier to keep track of. 
On our trips each person purchases different things some split between two people on the trip, some split between all, Splid keeps track of everything and tells you who owes who what $ amount at the end. It’s great.

Review Title: Simple and straightforward way to share expenses
Review Text: I’ve used Splid to share expenses on several trips with friends, and everybody has found it easy to use.  I wish you didn’t have to pay to upgrade in order to have more than one group active at a time, but it’s a small expense, and worthwhile.

App is fine, doesn't ask for personal info or contact access which is nice. The droid free version allows multi groups while free ios does not. Does well for its use, just not sure why the dif. Dev was prompt when I emailed about this, but his solution did not fix the issue. When i receive an invite to join a second group I am prompted to purchase the upgrade.

This app has been wonderful for our travel planning. The ability to change currency is great. Also, the flexibility in the reporting is wonderful. My detail oriented husband can see everything, but my “just tell me what I owe” friends can both easily see what they need. Wonderful tool!

I don’t usually write reviews and that just goes to show how much I am satisfied with this app. It is so easy to use and gives you the exact features you need to track your financials as a group. No ads is always the biggest selling point.

I cannot say enough good things about this app. As a CPA, I will see always the group accountant for all our frequent trips. Figuring out who owed who what and which expenses were split amongst which parties was a nightmare. It would take me days to get it all sorted out at the end of the trip. Now it’s a piece of cake. I recommend Splid to everyone

It would be nice if new/added expense categories showed up when a new group was is created, or maybe you should a lot more categories that cover a wider spectrum of expense types. Also, a notes section for each expense would be REALLY nice. Otherwise, pretty useful app…got us away from using paper for day-to-day shared expenses.

I have only used Splid for a week, but I like it very much. As a GenX, apps need to be intuitive & useful to stay on my phone. This does what it is supposed to & is easy to use with friends my age & younger. I expect to use it very much in the future & recommend to anyone who wants to split expenses.

Such an easy way to keep track of spending in groups while on vacation. Splid kept track of everyone’s spending and split it at the end to let everyone know who owes who what amount. Will definitely use again. Highly recommend.

My sister and I are traveling together and this has made keeping track of our expenses so much easier! It’s very easy to operate, clear, concise, and I would recommend it to anyone who is trying to keep track of their expenses with someone else.

I had a friend recommend this app and it worked fabulously. We had three travelers and we gave zero thought and time regarding how to split cost fairly and we put our energy in enjoying our trip. I would highly recommend!!

Love being able to keep track of and split expenses without having to think about it. Thank you for creating this app that allows me to enter all the parties with having to edit all of their emails and phone numbers, etc.!

It seems folks who split with one other person were fine, but we took a trip with 8 folks and there’s something bad in the programming. The expenses were all correct, but when settling up, it told folks they owed people they didn’t and then wrong amounts were added. We ended up just referring to the expenses sheet and manually adding up what folks owed. Super time consuming….. but hey, you get what you pay for….  : (

This app made splitting costs of a recent group trip very easy. We could all access the same group from our phones, and the app did all cost splitting calculations for us. I would highly recommend this for trips where multiple people will be slitting costs!

My husband used this for a vacation trip and told me about it. I recently used it for my own weekend trip with friends and it makes it so easy to split the bill for food, restaurants, lodging, car fees, etc. Highly recommend!

Very easy to use. Creates a PDF or excel file with the expenses and payments made. Best part is that you don’t need to create an account like other apps. Only issue is that you can only have one group at a time but it’s free so I can’t complain

Went on a girls trip this past weekend and used this app.  It could not have been easier to download, set up and implement.  It cuts out on the hassle of who paid for what and who owes who as it’s all done in app. My sister, the accountant, checked the math and found it to be spot on. Can not recommend enough!!!

Great way to make it easy to separate what everyone owes. I haven’t explored the program enough but I wish there was a way to say that everybody contributed ex dollar amount and then it takes from that amount so at the end you can re-distribute money to those who are due any additional refunds.

for our trip. The app is very intuitive, everything I wanted to do was easy to figure out. It also perfectly handled expenses in two currencies. All without needing to sign up for anything. Working offline is ideal when your trip is mostly a dead zone.
